data.title: NXP in the Netherlands
data.meta_description: NXP in the Netherlands features corporate offices, design, R&D, manufacturing and sales. Contact distributors, find jobs and locations.
data.text:
Our site in Delft is home to hardware and software design teams in the areas of wireless automotive electronics such as radio, GPS, car access systems and sensor electronics. These teams also have a wealth of knowledge and experience in designing wireless connectivity standards like Bluetooth® Low Energy, WiFi and proprietary standards.

In 2020, NXP was listed sixth in the top 30 of research and development investments in the Netherlands, published by the ‘Technisch Weekblad ’. Worldwide, NXP spent a total of €1,466 million on R&D, 14% of which was spent in the Netherlands.

In our multi-cultural company, we believe diversity is an indispensable asset. We look for people with the talent and energy for sustainable leadership and encourage all our team members to challenge themselves and develop to their full potential. Find your place
